attributes.action: Give our soldiers free life insurance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Soldiers heading to Iraq etc  are encouraged by the Ministry of Defence to take out life insurance
Our government should give our soldiers free life insurance when they join the armed forces and are fight for queen and country.
 their family's should be looked after properly and should not have to go through this stress if anything happens to their loved ones
